item.description:
Join us for dinner and drinks at Papa Razzi restaurant in Framingham (located on Rt 9). Papa Razzi has a wide selection of Italian dishes. Have a fun time relaxing with friendly and interesting people and enjoying a delicious dinner. Everyone pays for their own food/drink.

If you have trouble finding us, please call Catherine at 774 232 000. Look forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) near hostess area or at our table- please call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Dinner and Drinks at Papa Razzi, Framingham
